front.div:
The large scale and profitable deployment of Ethernet services requires Ethernet
technologies to support carrier grade capabilities, which include scalability, resiliency, traffic
engineering, QoS, and OAM (operation, administration and maintenance). Provider
Backbone Bridges (PBB) and Provider Backbone Bridge Traffic Engineering (PBB-TE) are
the emerging technology solutions for Carrier Grade Ethernet. PBB introduces the hierarchy
within service providers' backbone Ethernet networks, provides Ethernet address space
separation between customer domain and backbone domain and supports the scalability
requirement of carrier deployment of Ethernet. PBB-TE introduces traffic engineering,
connection oriented forwarding model, OAM and protection switching capabilities into carrier
Ethernet networks.
